SEARCH
Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class XReportController

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.XReportController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class XReportController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the X-Report view in the POS Manager System.

The X-Report summarizes the day's sales activity, including total revenue, tax collected, number of orders, payment method breakdowns, and hourly sales data. This class queries the PostgreSQL database for transactions created on the current day, formats the results for display, and populates the talble.

>Key features:/p>

  • Retrieves daily totals, item counts, and payment distributions.
  • Displays summarized metrics in a TableView using ReportRow objects.
  • Supports returning to the Manager Dashboard via a Back button.

This controller is automatically loaded by the FXML loader when the corresponding xReport.fxml file

Since:
2025-10-22
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allison Arndt

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed.

      Binds the TableView columns to the ReportRow properties, sets the report title, and triggers loading of the X-Report data.

      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null.
